verses.roman:
mora mukhe kahāya kathā, kare paracāra
pṛthivīte ke jānibe e-līlā tāṅhāra?'

synonyms: mora mukhe—in my mouth; kahāya—causes to speak; kathā—words; kare paracāra—preaches; pṛthivīte—in this world; ke jānibe—who will understand; e-līlā—this pastime; tāṅhāra—His.
translation: "In this way the Lord speaks through my mouth to preach the cult of Kṛṣṇa consciousness. Within the world, who will understand this pastime of the Lord?'
